original_text: Do not put it on the bodies of anyone, except priests. Do not use spices like this to make oil for yourselves. It is holy and you must always think about it as holy.
korean_text: 사람의 몸에 붓지 말며 이 방법대로 이와 같은 것을 만들지 말라 이는 거룩하니 너희는 거룩히 여기라

sentences.original_text: Do not put it on the bodies of anyone
Do not use spices like this

sentences.korean_translation: 너희 자신을 위해 기름을 만들기 위하여

sentences.original_text: and you must always think about it as holy
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 항상 그것을 거룩하게 여겨야 한다
